titles.title: To provide for the reliquidation of a certain drawback claim relating to juices.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 2/13/2002--Introduced. Directs the U.S. Customs Service to reliquidate a specified entry relating to juices at the full amount claimed and pay any amounts owed as a result of such liquidation within 90 days.
